# glomo-products-dm

Datamanagers to get and transform the products to be shown in Tranfers, Own Transfers and BillPayments for Chile and Mexico.

Example:
```html
<glomo-products-dm></glomo-products-dm>
```

## Styling

The following custom properties and mixins are available for styling:

| Custom property | Description     | Default        |
|:----------------|:----------------|:--------------:|
| --glomo-products-dm  | empty mixin     | {}             |
